attributes.action: call for the resignation of the leaders / councillors supporting the yes campaign for Manchester's congestion charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly, with a vote so resoundingly against Manchester's proposed congestion charge, those who supported the yes campaign and the millions of pounds of wasted public money on the referendum should be held accountable. They are evidently so out of touch with the people they purportedly represent to deserve being removed from office.
